entry.title: Friday: Increasing cloudiness. Temperature falling to minus 14 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 14 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 22 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near noon then cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 early in the afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Friday 10 February 2023
